post:
Hi LowEndTalkers,

we are now providing a new **SSD VPS** offer called MiniVPS.

As always, we offer our VPS with SSD hard drives, and trying to ensure the lowest possible price:

1GHz + 128 MB RAM + 128 MB vSwap + 2 GB SSD + 25 Mbps @ 15€/year
1GHz + 256 MB RAM + 256 MB vSwap + 4 GB SSD + 50 Mbps @ 30€/year

* OpenVZ virtualization
* SolusVM panel with 2 snapshoot backups.
* Servers hosted in Spain.
* Daily remote backups.
* TUN/TAP/PPP modules for VPN active.
* 100MB test file download: https://ginernet.com/100MB.test
* Test network tool: https://ginernet.com/ping-trace.php

Order on our website: https://ginernet.com/minivps.php


**Test Disk IO**

dd if=/dev/zero of=test bs=64k count=16k conv=fdatasync
16384+0 records in
16384+0 records out
1073741824 bytes (1.1 GB) copied, 3.85343 s, 279 MB/s

We are a RIPE member -> [Verify](https://www.ripe.net/membership/indices/data/es.ginernet.html)

I remain at your disposal to answer all questions.
Best regards.
